column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I usually order either the Tonkotsu Black ( my favorite)
column3: though I have also had the Sprouting up ramen and the Yatai Ramen ( I don't think this one is still on the menu). I would give this place 5 stars
column4: but sometimes there are slight fluctuations in the and saltiness of the broth
column5: and since Ramen is already pretty salty
